room_title: Escape room "Classroom Capers" by Escape Now Houston in Houston
room_description: You are all failing your grades (boo!), but you are being given one last chance to bring your grades up by taking a test. However, you have decided that rather than studying for the test, you are going to find the test answers that you know the teacher has in the classroom. On entering the classroom the door locks behind you, so you have 60 minutes to find the answer sheet and escape the room before the teacher returns.
